metadata.Title: CVE-2012-5480 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description:
The Database activity module in Moodle 2.1.x before 2.1.9, 2.2.x before2.2.6, and 2.3.x before 2.3.3 allows remote attackers to bypass intendedrestrictions on reading other participants' entries via an advanced search.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-5480` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.2.6.dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.6.dfsg-1').
